issue.title: [Release] Calculate the committer statistics from the master branch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8850](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8850). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Out current workflow for patch releases starts with cherry picking the selected patches from the master branch to a maint-\* branch which means that the original committer data gets lost.
